name: Aldnoah.Zero: Re-launch (Demo)
description:
InaSure / OrangeBat Aldnoah.Zero fan made game

Aldnoah.Zero: Re-Launch

It's a short demo with 15 minutes playtime + Opening video ^^
The main character is Kaizuka Inaho and the timeline start right after the anime ends. Months after Inaho put Slaine in jail, a mysterious terror attack begin at several places on Earth. The terrorist's main objective is to save Slaine Troyard and begin a coup d'etat to the new crowned queen, Asseylum and start the 3rd interplanetary war. But Inaho somehow knew about this and try to save both Earth and Slaine.
